# `RowSearchPredicate` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| columnId | `string` | Yes | The decision table column identifier this predicate applies to |
| operator | `string` | Yes | The search operator for this predicate |
| value | `string` | No | The value that will be searched for in rows. Exactly one of 'value' or 'special' can be used. |
| special | `string` | No | The special value that will be searched for in rows. Exactly one of 'value' or 'special' can be used. |
